title: How Toxic is too toxic?
body:
After a game of a yi jungler trying to:
- 1 v 5 after his team died because he refused to group
- claim he's a smurf so he "knows what im doin" as he dives head first into a morgana q and the entire enemy team
- spam all chat  to say that soraka was "side stepp and laugh when I died" when he was half way across the map and
- spam both all chat and team chat saying how soraka was "trassh" and "waste of brains ... bad supp.. no brains why play league of legends if no brains supp" (among others)

Summoner 1: come add me on <censored> or <censored>, we play 1 v1 to who is trash ehere
Summoner 2:  he's like 12 or something
Summoner 3:  im pretty sure
Summoner 3:  he's legit a little kid
Summoner 3:  and not old enough to be on league
Summoner 3:  he said he'd call riot
Summoner 2:  yeah
Summoner 3:  like on the phone
Summoner 3:  to have me perma banned
Summoner 1:  man if you get ranked never call person kid cuz the ranker will report immediate action will be taken at that point
Summoner 3:  for having less kills then him as yi ._.
Summoner 1:  he will not flame you but instealled he will riot and send bit essay in his face
Summoner 1:  gj i hacked your softwares do what you want, your account will be all mine now
Summoner 1 left the lobby

To clarify here are the stats and builds to further prove that the accusations were not even remotely true let alone justified:
https://preview.ibb.co/hjdPaa/Untitled1.png

Just noticing how the more toxic people are the more accounts they have... so I'm starting to think they are just dodging the bans by switching out accounts frequently.

Either way it's just a theory thought someone might find this as ridiculous and slightly humorous like I did, so I'm sharing the " wow " moment with you guys! Enjoy! {{item:3682}}
